text: Robert Costello (born July 26, 1965) is an American equestrian. He competed in the individual eventing at the 2000 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:American male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of the United States Category:Equestrians at the 2000 Summer Olympics Category:Pan American Games medalists in equestrian Category:Pan American Games gold medalists for the United States Category:Equestrians at the 2003 Pan American Games Category:Sportspeople from Beverly, Massachusetts
title: Robert Costello (equestrian)
